a.n: Everyday Turn-Ons: Close To The Edge

p.k: Like most modern couples, Shan and Mark struggle to fit sex into their busy lives along with family, friends and work. Keen to explore the idea of delayed satisfaction, the couple set a date in the diary, allowing them to climax at the weekend - but not before. After days of unbearable desire and almost-gasms, Shan and Mark let themselves go, bringing each other closer and closer to climax before coming harder than they?ve ever done before - proving good things do come to those who wait!
